Title: Includes certain veterans in the definition of resident as it relates to community colleges and state-aided four-year colleges
Summary: Includes active duty military and certain veterans going to college under the new GI bill in the definition of resident as it relates to community colleges and state-aided four-year colleges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to including certain veterans in the definition of resident as it relates to community colleges and state-aided four-year colleges
